alert.note: Alert for Pershing (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued June 02 at 12:29PM PDT until further notice by NWS Reno
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Reno has issued a Flood Advisory for the following rivers in Nevada... Humboldt River Near Imlay affecting Pershing County. .Elevated river flows along the Humboldt River have made their way to the lower reaches of the river with minor flooding anticipated near Imlay. For the Humboldt Basin...including Imlay...elevated river levels are forecast. ...FLOOD ADVISORY FOR SNOWMELT IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Flooding caused by snowmelt is expected. * WHERE...Humboldt River Near Imlay. * WHEN...From this afternoon until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 10.3 feet, Minor flooding of Tungsten Road south of the river between the river and the Pit Taylor Canal. Some minor low land flooding is possible very near the river from the Humboldt County line to Rye Patch. At a higher level access to Flying M Ranch via Old Idaho Stage Road is flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 12:05 PM PDT Friday the stage was 10.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early tomorrow afternoon and continue rising to 10.7 feet early Tuesday afternoon. Additional rises are possible thereafter. - Action stage is 9.5 feet. - Flood stage is 10.3 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: If you encounter a flooded roadway, turn around and find an alternative route. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
